text: @Zigmanfreud @GavinNewsom 50,000+ have died in 3 months, this is not the flu. These guys are not virology/epidemiology experts, they work in and own urgent cares please fly them out to an ER in #COVID19 hot spots where I have to tell family members their loved one has died of this virus EVERYDAY
